cards.title: Clara Cloverfield
body: At the start of the game, put this card into play.  Shuffle the environment deck.
This card is considered a hero card.
If this card has 1 or more HP, it is indestructible.
If this card is destroyed or otherwise removed from play, the heroes lose.

flavorQuotes.text: Read all about it{BR}in tomorrow's [b]Rook City Gazette[/b].

cards.title: Brainwashed Byliner
body: When this card enters play, destroy all Scoop cards in play.
At the end of the environment turn, {ClaraCloverfield} deals each hero target (other than herself) 1 projectile damage.
At the start of the environment turn, {ClaraCloverfield} deals each hero target (other than herself) 2 projectile damage.
cards.flavorText: Clara swept the gun back and forth{BR}robotically. There was not the slightest{BR}emotion on her face as her glassy eyes{BR}scanned the room for her next target.

cards.title: Combat Zone Correspondent
body: When this card enters play, destroy all Scoop cards in play.
Whenever a hero target or a villain target deals a non-indestructible target 4 or more damage, they also deal {ClaraCloverfield} 1 damage of the same type.
cards.flavorText: “Get to safety!” Legacy shouted over the{BR}howling wind. “No way,” Clara called back,{BR}“The story's [b]here[/b].”

cards.title: Hostage-Holding Henchman
body: When this card enters play, destroy all Scoop cards in play.
Environment cards may not be played.
At the end of the environment turn, this card deals {ClaraCloverfield} 3 melee damage.
cards.flavorText: “Seize her!” Voss cried. A pair of hands{BR}clamped down on Clara's shoulders. It{BR}was clear the Grand Warlord was not a{BR}believer in freedom of the press.

cards.title: Jeopardized Journalist
body: When this card enters play, destroy all Scoop cards in play.
A player may skip their turn to destroy this card.
At the start of the environment turn, destroy {ClaraCloverfield}, even if another card says she's indestructible.
cards.flavorText: Clara struggled against the ropes binding{BR}her. How long had she been here? And could{BR}that rumbling sound coming from up the{BR}tracks be the Megalopolis Express already?

cards.title: Risky Reporting
body: When this card enters play, destroy all Scoop cards in play.
Whenever the villain target with the highest HP deals damage to the hero target with the highest HP, redirect that damage to {ClaraCloverfield}.
cards.flavorText: As Clara crested the pile of rubble, she{BR}saw Omnitron aiming a disintegration ray{BR}at Chrono-Ranger. Suddenly, the robot's{BR}head snapped toward her.

cards.title: Emergency Medicine
body: When this card enters play, destroy all Peril cards in play.
When a hero would regain HP, they may have {ClaraCloverfield} regain that much HP instead.
cards.flavorText: When the Scholar caught sight of{BR}the bloody gash on the reporter's{BR}head, he turned from the battle{BR}without hesitation.

cards.title: "Get Behind Me!"
body: When this card enters play, destroy all Peril cards in play.
When {ClaraCloverfield} would be dealt damage, it may be redirected to the hero with the lowest HP.

flavorQuotes.text: Don't worry.  These energy blasts can't get through my armour.
Can I quote you on that?

cards.flavorText: Bunker crouched over the newswoman{BR}protectively. “Don't worry. These energy blasts{BR}can't get through my armor.” Clara grinned{BR}up at him. “Can I quote you on that?”

cards.title: Life-Energy Transfusion
body: When this card enters play, destroy all Peril cards in play.
Then, each hero may deal themselves 1 energy damage.  {ClaraCloverfield} regains X HP, where X is the total amount of damage dealt this way.
At the end of the environment turn, destroy this card.

flavorQuotes.text: Thought I was a gonner that time.
Medically speaking, you were, for 37 seconds.

cards.flavorText: “Thought I was a goner that time,” Clara{BR}groaned as she opened her eyes. Tachyon{BR}switched the machine off, then replied,{BR}“Medically speaking, you were, for 37 seconds.”

cards.title: Mid-Air Catch
body: When this card enters play, destroy all Peril cards in play.
When {ClaraCloverfield} would be dealt damage, a player may destroy one of their ongoing cards to prevent that damage.
cards.flavorText: Clara plummetted faster and faster, her{BR}screams trailing upward, until her descent{BR}was brought to an abrupt halt... not by the{BR}ground, but by Fanatic's outstretched arms.

cards.title: Breaking News
body: When this card enters play, destroy all Rescue cards in play.
Then, the player of the hero with the lowest HP may search their deck for an ongoing or equipment card and put it into play.
At the end of the environment turn, destroy this card.

flavorQuotes.text: Wait. Since when do you have laser vision?

cards.flavorText: “Wait. Since when do you have [b]laser{BR}vision[/b]?” Clara asked, her notebook{BR}appearing in her hands as if by{BR}magic.

cards.title: Exclusive Interview
body: When this card enters play, destroy all Rescue cards in play.
At the end of the environment turn, reveal the top card of the villain deck.  Replace or discard it.

flavorQuotes.text: Very well, Ms. Cloverfield. Perhaps your readers will appreciate the genius of my plan, even if the rest of the world does not.

cards.flavorText: “Very well, Ms. Cloverfield,” Baron Blade{BR}said at last. “Perhaps your readers will{BR}appreciate the genius of my plan, even{BR}if the rest of the world does not.”

cards.title: Exposé
body: When this card enters play, destroy all Rescue cards in play.
At the end of the environment turn, destroy a villain ongoing card.
At the start of the environment turn, destroy the villain target with the lowest HP, other than a character card, if it has 10 or fewer HP.
cards.flavorText: Maia gave a grim nod as she finished reading{BR}and tossed the paper down onto her dining {BR}room table. The [i]Gazette[/i] had done its part, but{BR}the Wraith would take it from here.

cards.title: Feature Story
body: When this card enters play, destroy all Rescue cards in play.
Damage dealt to villain targets is irreducible.

flavorQuotes.text: No one will know it was me who leaked this, right?

cards.flavorText: “No one will know it was me who leaked{BR}this, right?” Citizen Autumn glanced around{BR}the alley nervously. Clara shook her head.{BR}“I always protect my sources.”
